feature.label: Mod4j BusinessDomain Feature
feature.description: The Mod4j features supports modeling and code generation through small independent DSL's. for Java projects. This business domain language is one of those DSL's.
feature.copyright: (c) 2008, Ordina: original contributor (c) 2008, Jos Warmer & Anneke Kleppe: Java code generation for associations is based on the code generator from Octopus (http://octopus.sourceforge.net)
